name: Bread Blood Butter (DAE Studios, Poesbroek, jdelanghe, FrankyDB3, Carolina R.)
name_original: Bread Blood Butter (DAE Studios, Poesbroek, jdelanghe, FrankyDB3, Carolina R.)
description:
Pay off debts by sending out hitmen on jobs to make money for you. Think before you act, you never know what could hit you.

Hire hitman. Assassinate targets. Profit. 

But don't get caught.... 

This awesome game is the result of four creative students who teamed up in the first sprint of 2 Games a Month (2GAM)  2023.

2 Games a Month is a yearly indie development program for aspiring entrepreneurs. It’s a dynamic meeting ground for complementary profiles in which the focus is developing cool games with market potential.
